
{{alias}}( obj, prop, getter )
    Defines a read-only accessor.

    Parameters
    ----------
    obj: Object
        Object on which to define the property.

    prop: string
        Property name.

    getter: Function
        Get accessor.

    Examples
    --------
    > var obj = {};
    > function getter() { return 'bar'; };
    > {{alias}}( obj, 'foo', getter );
    > obj.foo
    'bar'

    See Also
    --------
